channel.title: PLEASE READ! *Need help with start a server that i edited!
channel.description: I was on the folder*HybridScape* Edited something..like NPC drops, Shops, Combat and HP of NPC`s! And when i start MoparScape and log into HybridScape it says *Connection Lost* Please wait - attempting to reestablish I do not understand..! I did not edit any of these ClientHandler and NPCHandler..! Please answer! :rolleyes:

Its unbealiveable! I had never found this out without help from runelocus or what it was…

item.title: PLEASE READ! *Need help with start a server that i edited!
item.dc:creator: @kniveslives kniveslives
item.description:
@kniveslives wrote:

[quote=“dracowizard2, post:1, topic:152128”]I was on the folderHybridScape Edited something…like NPC drops, Shops, Combat and HP of NPC`s!
And when i start MoparScape and log into HybridScape it says
Connection Lost
Please wait - attempting to reestablish
I do not understand…! I did not edit any of these ClientHandler and NPCHandler…!
Please answer! :rolleyes:[/quote]

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Try the Compiler I use…I gave this one to Mod Nick as well I believe, it’s so popular now

Read full topic
